title: Ocmulgee National Monument: Indoor Activities
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Indoor Activities              Indoor Activities                   Wattle and Daub House in museum               Gorget shell necklace               Lamar Bold Style Pottery               clovis point                Trading Post Display in Museum         Â    Our museum has 2,000 artifacts on display dating from 10,000 B.C.E-1800's. There is also a 17 minute orientation film on the history of the park available for viewing upon request.
